title: French Montana Joins the Show!
description:
French Montana joins Jalen & Jacoby to talk about his latest release, “Montega”. He talks about what he would do for the New York Knicks and breaks down his own basketball game. Also, Kyrie watch ticks down to Wednesday’s deadline. Will Kyrie re-up with the Brooklyn Nets or will he be on a new by the end of the week? Listen to find out Kyrie’s most likely destination. Dame Lillard posted a photo of Kevin Durant in a Portland Trailblazers’ jersey. Find out if it’s all in good fun or maybe there might be something there. Plus, rookie Bennedict Mathurin is entering the league with plenty of confidence. Listen to hear what he had to say about LeBron James. All that and more…
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
